    1. createWebSocket(JettyServerUpgradeRequest, JettyServerUpgradeResponse)

Interface JettyWebSocketCreator

public interface JettyWebSocketCreator
Abstract WebSocket creator interface.

Should you desire filtering of the WebSocket object creation due to criteria such as origin or sub-protocol, then you will be required to implement a custom WebSocketCreator implementation.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    Object
    createWebSocket(JettyServerUpgradeRequest req, JettyServerUpgradeResponse resp)
    Create a websocket from the incoming request.

  • Method Details

    • createWebSocket

      Object createWebSocket(JettyServerUpgradeRequest req, JettyServerUpgradeResponse resp) throws Exception
      Create a websocket from the incoming request.

      If no websocket is to be created (return value of null), the JettyWebSocketCreator is responsible for sending a response with JettyServerUpgradeResponse.sendError(int, String), JettyServerUpgradeResponse.sendForbidden(String) or JettyServerUpgradeResponse.setStatusCode(int).

      Parameters:
      req - the request details
      resp - the response details
      Returns:
      a websocket object to use, or null if no websocket should be created from this request.
      Throws:
      Exception - if the WebSocket creation throws
